data.eml:eml: Four new species of deep-water catsharks of the genus Parmaturus (Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae) from New Caledonia, Indonesia and Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Séret, Bernard, Last, Peter R. (2007): Four new species of deep-water catsharks of the genus Parmaturus (Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae) from New Caledonia, Indonesia and Australia. Zootaxa 1657: 23-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179871
